entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 70%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this morning with 30 percent chance of showers late this morning and early this afternoon then 70 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this afternoon. High 10. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 5. POP 70%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 70 percent chance of showers changing to 30 percent chance of showers this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High 14.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 14. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
